resources.string: Username can only contain lowercase or/and uppercase. Username length: from 3 to 20 symbols.
Email can only contain lowercase, uppercase, numbers, special symbols (@._-). Email length: from 10 to 50 symbols.
Password can only contain lowercase, uppercase, numbers, special symbols (.!@_). Password length: from 5 to 20 symbols.
